bioconda.name: fastme
bioconda.summary: a comprehensive, accurate and fast distance-based phylogeny inference program.

biocontainers.name: fastme
biocontainers.summary: a comprehensive, accurate and fast distance-based phylogeny inference program.

biotools.summary: Distance algorithms to infer phylogenies. It's based on balanced minimum evolution, which is the very principle of NJ. It includes Nearest Neighbor Interchange (NNI) and also Subtree Pruning and Regrafting (SPR), while remaining as fast as NJ and providing a number of facilities: distance estimation for DNA and proteins with various models and options, bootstrapping, and parallel computations.

bioschemas.name: FastME
bioschemas.summary: Distance algorithms to infer phylogenies. It's based on balanced minimum evolution, which is the very principle of NJ. It includes Nearest Neighbor Interchange (NNI) and also Subtree Pruning and Regrafting (SPR), while remaining as fast as NJ and providing a number of facilities: distance estimation for DNA and proteins with various models and options, bootstrapping, and parallel computations.
